mapper.delete: delete from file_share where user_id = #{userId} and share_id in(#{item})
mapper.select: select fs.share_id,fs.file_id,fs.user_id,fs.share_time,fs.expire_time,fs.code,fs.show_count, fi.file_name,fi.folder_type,fi.file_category,fi.file_type,fi.file_cover from file_share fs join file_info fi on fs.file_id=fi.file_id where user_id = #{user_id} and fi.status=2 and fi.del_flag=2 order by fs.share_time desc

select fs.file_id,fs.user_id,fs.share_time,fs.expire_time, ui.nick_name,fi.file_name from file_share fs join user_info ui on fs.user_id=ui.user_id join file_info fi on fs.file_id=fi.file_id where share_id = #{share_id} and ui.status=0 and fi.status=2 and fi.del_flag=2 order by fs.share_time desc
